name: sass-link
description: Made with component based structure in mind, use this to create a styles.scss file and regularly watch your current folder for any scss partials (looks for '_<name>.scss' files in in any folder) to update this styles.scss with links to those partials! :)

This package contains a CLI command that will look for all of the sass partials (_<name>.scss) you have in your current folder and compile all of their sass stylings into the named css file, which can be named in the CLI command.
author: Maverick Oleson
